bug.summary: Connections ignored after exceptions in thread pool mode.
bug.text: In some circumstances, a connections were not marked selectable after an exception, meaning future requests on them were not noticed in thread pool mode.

bug.summary: Timeouts sometimes ignored when scan granularity is zero
bug.text: A bug in connection handling meant that integer timeouts could be ignored if the scan granularity was set to zero.

bug.summary: Deallocation bug assigning an Any to itself
bug.text: Assigning an Any to itself would cause it to be incorrectly deallocated.
